```{r}
library(RCurl)
library(jsonlite)
library(dplyr)

# Fetch dataset
url <- "https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/machine-learning-databases/00296/dataset_diabetes.zip"
temp <- tempfile()
download.file(url, temp)
unzip(temp, exdir = tempdir())
data_path <- file.path(tempdir(), "dataset_diabetes/diabetic_data.csv")

# Read the dataset
diabetes_data <- read.csv(data_path, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

```
